outputs.name: shade_set
outputs.description:
A list of shade modifiers that can be used to edit or create
a ModifierSet object.

inputs.name: _exterior_shade_
inputs.description:
A modifier object for exterior shades (or text for
the identifier of the modifier within the library).

inputs.name: _interior_shade_
inputs.description:
A modifier object for interior shades (or text for
the identifier of the modifier within the library).

name: HB Shade Modifier Subset
description:
Create a list of modifiers that can be used to edit or create a ModifierSet object.
